Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.util

Class ColorCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.util.ColorCLI
  • public class ColorCLI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to get the color to use in the CLI
